shortDescription: Cyberoam NetGenie C0101B1-20141120-NG11VO devices through 2021-08-14 allow tweb/ft.php?u=[XSS] attacks.
vulnerabilityName: cyberoamworks netgenie_c0101b1-20141120-ng11vo_firmware Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
